name: exlimd
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: syl6ib(w0, wex(s0, w1), w2, wex(s0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2)))
-| wb(wex(s0, w2), w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2)))
-| wb(wex(s0, w2), w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w1), w2))
-| wb(wex(s0, w2), w2)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w1), w2))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wnf(s0, w2)

comment: Deduction form of Theorem 19.9 of [Margaris] p. 89. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jan-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 12-Jan-2018.)
